cab.content: Military Secret.935From Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India,bth June 1919. (Received 7th.)7684. 6th June. No. 26. Part 1. Tribal lasbkars are said to be joining-Afghan troops marching from Asmar towards Birkot. Bashkul Kafirs fearing punishment from Afghans are fleeing into Chitral. No other change north of Kabul river or in Afridi and Orakzai country. Kurain satisfactory, Tochi quieter. No further developments Bannn and Derajat border. Manikhwa post reported as captured in yesterday's summary now reported as surrendered by Militia. Mnsa Khel of Zhob so far quiet. Chaman, Mekran, Seistan satisfactory and no change.Part 2. After joining up with Dardoni Column at Isha, Bannu Column returned to Idak, no opposition. Aeroplanes have arrived Tank. Column from Khirgi engaged tribesmen near Girni, and inflicted casualties, believed heavy. Zhob posts are being-reinforced.
